text: @CDCDirector Dr. Redfield we’re 3 mo. in to #coronavirus and there’s no progress.  Please get off twitter and get to work.  All of the 🇺🇸 taxpayers paying your salary deserve better than this trainwreck you and the #CDC are responsible for #COVID19 #COVID #FireRedfield #FireFauci #sundayvibes

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
